PerformanceResourceTimingDecodedBodySize.summary: The decodedBodySize read-only property returns the size (in octets) received from the fetch (HTTP or cache) of the message body after removing any applied content encoding (like gzip or Brotli). If the resource is retrieved from an application cache or local resources, it returns the size of the payload after removing any applied content encoding.
PerformanceResourceTimingDecodedBodySize.value: The decodedBodySize property can have the following values:
